segments.text: Hello , Jim . What was the film like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Awful . It was a complete waste of time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It was about a married couple . They had to live with the wife's mother , because they didn't have enough money to buy a house of their own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: A lot of young people have to do that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . but the husband had to work overtime three times a week , so he was always tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: lt sounds like the story of my life .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , it does , doesn't it ? But this man was always over-tired , and he couldn't sleep.So he used to take two sleeping pill every night .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but not two every night . Anyway , the strain was too much for him . He had nervous breakdown and had to go to hospital .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It sounds a very depressing film .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Not really . His wife was able to find a good job as an interpreter , because she could speak French and German fluently . After a few months ' work , she had a better job than her husband . So in the end ,
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don't know . My wife used to speak French . I must tell her to brush it up .
segments.speaker: S1
